name: Driftmaster
description:
Alone in the countrysides of Canada, drift your favorite car to gain skill and mastery over each road. Only by refining your skills can you become a true Drfitmaster. Find solace and purpose in this fixed-angle, top-down, arcade drift racer, where you compete against yourself to refine your ability and master your drifting skills.

Features

  • The Cars: A collection of cars including sedans, supercars, wagons, SUVs and more
  • The Controls: Razor sharp arcade controls give you precise authority over your car. Feel like the master...be the master
  • Gorgeous landscapes: Race through beautiful and varied cities inspired by Canadian locations.
  • Engaging soundtrack: A score unlike any racer.

The Rest

  • Race refinement. Each run is a brushstroke to your masterpiece. Race against your previous time and chisel away at your Mastery Score
  • Huge list of metrics to track your skill
  • Use your winnings to upgrade your car or buy a new one
  • Track your progression with the Mastery Score



------------------------------

Find solace and purpose while you complete your journey from driver to MASTER
